pages.text: $(#551012)I awaken abruptly, disoriented and confused. The heat is overwhelming, and the air is thick with the stench of sulfur and ash. A strange sense of urgency pushes me to move. I don't know where it's coming from but it feels... $(italics)relentless.$()

$(#551012)Survival instincts kick in. I need to $(#FFFF55)gather and craft basic equipment$(#551012) from the environment. The surrounding stone would likely make good tools. The $(#FFFF55)mushrooms$(#551012) scattered around look edible, and there might be some $(#FFFF55)food in the trees$(#551012) as well. I have no idea why I'm here, but perhaps I can piece together this mystery. I notice what looks like an $(#FFFF55)ancient fortress$(#551012) in the distance, I should $(#FFFF55)prepare some gear before...$(#551012)
$(#551012)... I venture closer.$(br2)Glancing at my right wrist, I notice a red eye etched into my skin. On my left wrist, a scar spells out $(#FFFF55)"ASCEND"$(#551012). Is that my handwriting?
